channel.title: Adri on Christine & Jon
channel.description: Recent content in Adri on Christine & Jon

item.title: Portugal
item.description: Recently visited Portugal, learned about the Carnation Revolution, and ate Pastéis de Belém.

item.title: Japan
item.description: Recently visited Japan. Stayed overnight at a Buddhist temple, partially ascended Mount Misen, and munched on kushikatsu. Also ate unadon, chutoro and snacked on baumkuchen from konbinis. Found quirkiness in Tokyo and then serenity in Kyoto.
